about_the_game:
LIMB: Origins is a dark science fiction horror game that plunges players into a mysterious parallel world known as LIMB. You take on the role of an unnamed scientist who arrives in LIMB on a mission to support a research team, only to find that all expedition members have vanished without a trace, and the device for returning home—the teleporter—is out of order. Your task is to survive in this hostile world, uncover the mystery of your colleagues' disappearance, and find a way to return home.

Game Features:

  • A Linear Story with Open-World Elements: Your primary goal is to find a way to escape from LIMB, but players can explore the world and learn more about the missing scientists at their own discretion.

  • Mysterious Atmosphere: The world of LIMB is depicted in shades of gray, creating a unique liminal atmosphere where the transition between day and night adds depth to the feelings of loneliness and anxiety, with horror elements intensifying the sense of threat.

  • Survival Mechanics: Manage your basic needs such as hunger, thirst, and fatigue, search for resources, and find shelter to survive in the face of constant danger.

  • Exploration and Mysteries: Investigate abandoned locations, solve puzzles, and gather clues to unravel the secrets of LIMB and the fate of the research team.

  • Unique Parallel World: Each area of LIMB is unique and filled with mysteries waiting to be uncovered, as well as hidden dangers.

  • Interactive Environment: Interact with the surroundings to find necessary tools and materials for teleporter repair and survival in a world filled with horrors.

Plot:

In LIMB: Origins, you assume the role of a scientist joining an expedition to the parallel world of LIMB. Upon arrival, you discover that the research team has disappeared, leaving behind only mysteries and traces of their presence. Your mission is to survive in this uncharted world where every step can lead to new discoveries or perils. The cycle of day and night serves as a reminder of your fragile situation, and you must stay alert to meet your basic needs and avoid threats lurking in the shadows. As you explore LIMB, you collect evidence that may shed light on the fate of your colleagues and aid you in restoring the teleporter to return home.
